articles.content: YouTube has announced that they have been exploring options to hide the ‘dislike’ button counter that currently appears on each video. This feature has been around since 2010, but has become of great… [+3179 chars]

articles.author: Mariella Moon
articles.title: Now Twitter lets you add stickers and GIFs to fleets - Yahoo News Australia
articles.description: Twitter has updated fleets with the ability to embellish them with fun stickers without having to use another app.
articles.content: Twitter has updated fleets with the ability to embellish them with fun stickers without having to use another app. While the feature's absence didn't make fleets unusable, it gives users a way to add… [+1237 chars]

articles.author: Max Langridge
articles.title: Bell & Ross Offers Three Times The Functionality With Latest GMT Watch - DMARGE
articles.description: Bell & Ross is a watch brand closely associated with aviation – so when they announce a new GMT model, you know it's gonna be a gem.
